quest.name: My Little Chocobo (Immortal Flames)
journal: Swift believes you should get yourself a chocobo.

To obtain your personal chocobo, you must present Mimigun with a Flame Chocobo Issuance. This document can be obtained by exchanging company seals with the flame quartermaster. Here's hoping you have been setting aside your seals...
Mimigun brings you your bird, and it is love at first sight. Name your new companion, and make it official.
After much deliberation, you decide on a name worthy of the noblest steed. Inform Mimigun to complete the last of the formalities.
And so begins the adventures of Forename Surname and Companion. May their friendship last for eternity!
objectives: Present a Flame Chocobo Issuance to Mimigun.

dialogue.name: Swift
dialogue.text: [GC Rank][GC Rank][GC Rank] Surname, yes? A moment of your time, if you please.

dialogue.name: Swift
dialogue.text: You wish to carry out your duties swiftly, do you not? Well then, perhaps you should get yourself a chocobo.

dialogue.name: Swift
dialogue.text: If you're interested, the Immortal Flames will furnish you with one. It's not a complex process, but it does require some paperwork.

dialogue.name: Swift
dialogue.text: First, speak with the quartermaster to obtain a Flame Chocobo Issuance. You'll need to exchange company seals in order to do so. Once you've received your issuance, show it to Mimigun by the Gate of Nald. He'll be the one to furnish you with a bird.

dialogue.name: Swift
dialogue.text: If you wish to acquire your own personal chocobo, you'll need to get a Flame Chocobo Issuance from the quartermaster. Show the deed to Mimigun at the stables, and he'll furnish you with your own bird.

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: Want a bird issued, you say? Then I'll need to see your Flame Chocobo Issuance.

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: Yes, everything appears to be in order.

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: A moment please. I'll be right back with your chocobo.

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: And here he is! The fellow has been in high spirits the past few bells. He must have sensed that his master was coming!

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: Now then, to make it official, you'll want to give your noble steed a name.

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: Want a bird issued, you say? Then I'll need to see your Flame Chocobo Issuance. You can get one from the Flame quartermaster, over at the Hall of Flames.

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: Of course, you will need to exchange Flame Seals for it. You can earn these by completing tasks for the Immortal Flames, Ul'dah's Grand Company.

dialogue.name: CHOCOBO
dialogue.text: Kweh!

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: Now then, to make it official, you'll want to give your noble steed a name.

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: Heh heh! I daresay he likes his name!

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: Here is your very own chocobo whistle. Simply blow into it, and your feathered friend will come bounding to your side.

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: But do forgive him if he doesn't respond when summoned in crowded city areas or monster-infested lairs. Chocobos are stout-hearted creatures, but they have their limits.

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: And lastly, I present you with your chocobo rider's license, as is required by law.

dialogue.name: MIMIGUN
dialogue.text: And that concludes all the formalities! I wish you and your chocobo long years of fulfilling companionship!

dialogue.name: CHOCOBO
dialogue.text: Name Your Chocobo

dialogue.name: CHOCOBO
dialogue.text: Name

dialogue.name: CHOCOBO
dialogue.text: Names must be between 2 and 20 alphabetic characters.
